metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6508 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
epan/dissectors/packet-rlc.c in the RLC dissector in Wireshark 1.12.xbefore 1.12.13 and 2.x before 2.0.5 uses an incorrect integer data type,which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (large loop) viaa crafted packet.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6508` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 2.0.5+ga3be9c6-1
libwireshark10 - 2.0.5+ga3be9c6-1
libwiretap7 - 2.0.5+ga3be9c6-1
libwscodecs1 - 2.0.5+ga3be9c6-1
libwsutil8 - 2.0.5+ga3be9c6-1
tshark - 2.0.5+ga3be9c6-1
wireshark - 2.0.5+ga3be9c6-1
wireshark-common - 2.0.5+ga3be9c6-1
wireshark-gtk - 2.0.5+ga3be9c6-1
wireshark-qt - 2.0.5+ga3be9c6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.5+ga3be9c6-1').
